# Create with words
[Write](https://kuldeep1a.github.io/Write/#)

https://kuldeep1a.github.io/Write/
#
This service operates as a client-side Write platform without a data store. It transforms text into URLs using LZMA compression and Base64 encoding. For instance, it can host its [own HTML version](https://kuldeep1a.github.io/Write/#). The unique feature is that the entire paste is embedded within the URL, eliminating the risk of data loss due to a third-party service shutting down or deleting old pastes. With the URL, you always have access to your pasted data.
